statements: UPDATE costume_inventory SET quantity = 10, last_alteration_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE costume_id = 1;
UPDATE costume_inventory SET color = 'Blue', ordered_by = 'John Doe' WHERE size = 'Large';
UPDATE costume_inventory SET quantity = quantity - 1, last_alteration_date = '2022-02-15' WHERE costume_id = 101
UPDATE costume_inventory SET size = 'XL', ordered_by = 'John Doe' WHERE costume_id = 102
UPDATE DanceCostumeInventory SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE costume_id = 1001;
UPDATE Orders SET delivery_date = '2022-12-31', total_cost = 150.50 WHERE order_id = 2005;
UPDATE DanceCostumeInventory SET quantity = quantity + 5, color = 'Blue' WHERE costume_id = 123;
UPDATE Orders SET total_cost = total_cost * 0.90, delivery_date = '2022-10-30' WHERE order_id = 456;
UPDATE dance_costumes SET size = 'M', quantity = 10 WHERE costume_id = 1;
UPDATE alterations SET date_completed = '2023-01-15' WHERE alteration_id = 2;
UPDATE dance_costumes SET quantity = 10, size = 'Medium' WHERE costume_name = 'Ballet Tutu';
UPDATE alterations SET date_completed = '2023-01-15', alteration_type = 'Hemming' WHERE costume_id = 3;
UPDATE costumes SET costume_type = 'Superhero' WHERE costume_id = 1;
UPDATE costume_orders SET quantity = 10 WHERE order_id = 100 AND costume_id = 3;
UPDATE costumes SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE costume_id = 101
UPDATE alterations SET description = 'Minor alterations completed' WHERE costume_id = 102
UPDATE DanceCostumes SET costume_name = 'Sparkling Dress', costume_color = 'Silver' WHERE costume_id = 101;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 50, last_updated = '2023-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE costume_id = 202;
UPDATE DanceCostumes SET costume_color = 'Red', costume_size = 'Small' WHERE costume_id = 100;
UPDATE Inventory SET quantity = 50, location = 'Warehouse' WHERE costume_id = 200;
